Quickstrike:





Quickstrike sighed, looking out into the horizon. The sky was full of white 
sparkling stars. The air blew gently through the cave, what could manage. He 
stood by the CR chamber, not waiting for someone in particular. Not even 
Stintra. He was getting tired. He needed to find a quiet, safe place to 
sleep. He looked around.  There was no one to keep watch of the base. Except 
himself. Slag those fools who left. He looked like he was the only one that 
would keep watch.

So, he would wait until Stintra recovered for him to rest. He transformed to 
beast mode, and continued to watch the horizon.
